author: stsp
msg: * tools/dev/unix-build/Makefile.svn: Always do a short sleep after stopping
httpd. If httpd attempts to re-start too quickly it can fail to start
and abort a test run, e.g. during the transition from "neon x bdb"

author: rubys
msg: Complete sweep based on what I've learned

author: marvin
msg: Remove incorrect -R flag to chmod in a recipe for changing permissions.
Recursion is already handled via the "find" command, and the -R was causing
nested files to have their permissions set inappropriately to 775.
